      Parameters:

    • readResponse

    • convertConversationsToCSV

      public static boolean convertConversationsToCSV(ArrayList<Conversation> exportingConversations, String destinationPath) throws IOException
      Converts the chosen Conversation objects to exportable .csv files and exports them to the parameter destinationPath
      Parameters:
      exportingConversations - The ArrayList<Conversation> of conversations to be exported
      destinationPath - The destination of all .csv files
      Returns:
      Returns whether the .csv conversion and export succeeded
      Throws:
      IOException - in the case of a conversion failure

    • refreshVisibleConversations

      public static ArrayList<Conversation> refreshVisibleConversations(BufferedReader reader, PrintWriter writer, User loggedOnUser)
      Client sends a request to the server and refresh the local variable for the ArrayList<Conversation> to implement live blocking, invisibility, and refreshing conversation titles
      Parameters:
      reader - The BufferedReader object to be used to read network responses
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      loggedOnUser - The active user
      Returns:
      Returns the updated ArrayList<Conversation> conversations

    • refreshVisibleMessages

      public static ArrayList<Message> refreshVisibleMessages(BufferedReader reader, PrintWriter writer, Conversation conversation, User loggedOnUser)
      Client sends a request to the server and refresh the local variable for the ArrayList<Message> to implement refreshing
      Parameters:
      reader - The BufferedReader object to be used to read network responses
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      conversation - The Conversation object of the currently opened conversation
      loggedOnUser - The active user
      Returns:
      Returns the updated ArrayList<Message> messages

    • refreshCustomers

      public static ArrayList<Customer> refreshCustomers(BufferedReader reader, PrintWriter writer, User loggedOnUser)
      Client sends a request to the server and refresh the local variable for the ArrayList<Customer> to implement live blocking and invisibility
      Parameters:
      reader - The BufferedReader object to be used to read network responses
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      loggedOnUser - The active user
      Returns:
      Returns the updated ArrayList<Customer> customer
